body_html: Yes, that's right. What I was trying to say that divisible batch_size doesn't necessarily have impact on performance in practice, so to not confuse the users, probably excluding that part will be better.
body_text: Yes, that's right. What I was trying to say that divisible batch_size doesn't necessarily have impact on performance in practice, so to not confuse the users, probably excluding that part will be better.
body: Yes, that's right. What I was trying to say that divisible `batch_size` doesn't necessarily have impact on performance in practice, so to not confuse the users, probably excluding that part will be better.
